DASS¶

template<typename K, class V>
class DASS_Verifier¶

Client side structure for quering keys and updating it’s key set.

Public Functions

DASS_Verifier(DASS_Tracker<K, V> &vo_control)¶

Constructor for DASS_Verifier.

Parameters

  • vo_control: An instance of DASS_Tracker.

void install(DASS_Tracker<K, V> &vo_control)¶

Install DASS_Verifier from DASS_Tracker.

Parameters

  • vo_control: An instance of DASS_Tracker.

void operator=(DASS_Verifier<K, V> const &vo_data)¶

Install DASS_Verifier from another DASS_Verifier.

Parameters

  • vo_control: An instance of DASS_Verifier.

V query(const K key)¶

Queries the value of a key.

Return

Value of the key.

Parameters

  • key: Key to be queried.

vector<V> batch_query(const vector<K> keys)¶

Queries keys in a batch.

Return

Values of the keys queried.

Parameters

  • keys: Keys to be queried.

float batch_query_performance(const vector<K> &keys)¶

Measures batch query performance.

Return

The time it took to query the keys.

Parameters

  • keys: The keys to be inserted.

uint64_t getMemoryCost()¶

Gets the memory cost of the structure.

Return

The memory consumption of the structure..

void insert(pair<K, V> kv, vector<uint32_t> &flipped_indexes)¶

Inserts a kv pair with flipped indexes.

Parameters

  • kv: Key value pair to be inserted.

  • flipped_indexes: The flipped indexes resulting from this insertion.

void setValue(pair<K, V> kv, vector<uint32_t> &flipped_indexes)¶

Sets value of a key.

Parameters

  • kv: The key value pair that is to be set.

  • flipped_indexes: The flipped indexes resulting from this operation.

template<typename K, class V>
class DASS_Tracker¶

The server side structure which modifies keys and generates flipped indexes for changes.

Public Functions

DASS_Tracker(uint32_t n_positive_keys, uint32_t n_negative_keys, float load_factor = 0.95, float othello_ratio = 1)¶

Constructor for DASS_Tracker

Parameters

  • n_positive_keys: Number of positive keys are going to be inserted.

  • n_negative_keys: Number of negative keys are going to be inserted.

  • load_factor: How full the structure should be at initialization.

  • othello_ratio: Othello ratio.

DASS_Tracker(DASS_Tracker const &obj)¶

Constructor for DASS_Tracker

Parameters

  • obj: An instance of DASS_Tracker

void clear()¶

Clears the vacuum filter.

void rebuild(float load_factor, float othello_ratio)¶

Rebuilds the Tracker

Parameters

  • load_factor: How loaded the structure should be.

  • othello_ratio: The othello ratio.

void init(uint32_t n_positive_keys, uint32_t n_negative_keys, float load_factor = 0.95, float othello_ratio = 1)¶

An initializer for DASS_Tracker.

Parameters

  • n_positive_keys: The number of positive keys.

  • n_negative_keys: The number of negative keys.

  • load_factor: How loaded the structure should be.

  • othello_ratio: The othello ratio.

int optimal_fp_len()¶

Calculates the optimal fp len.

Return

The optimal fp le.

bool batch_insert(const vector<K> &positive_keys, const vector<K> &negative_keys)¶

Inserts keys in batch.

Return

false is if the structure was rebuilt and true if it wasn’t.

Parameters

  • positive_keys: A vector of positive keys to be inserted.

  • negative_keys: A vector of negative keys to be inserted.

vector<uint32_t> insert(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Inserts a key value pair.

Return

The flipped indexes resulting from this insertion.

Parameters

  • kv: Key value pair to be inserted.

vector<uint32_t> setValue(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Sets the value of a key.

Parameters

  • kv: Key value of the key to be set to a value.

void erase(K key)¶

Erases a key.

Parameters

  • key: The key to be erased.

vector<uint32_t> othello_flipped_indexes(vector<uint64_t> &pre_mem, vector<uint64_t> &post_mem)¶

Generates the flipped indexes.

Return

The resulting flipped indexes.

Parameters

  • pre_mem: The indexes before.

  • post_mem: The indexes after.

V query(const K key)¶

Queries the value of the key.

Return

The value of the key.

Parameters

  • key: The key to be queried.

vector<V> batch_query(vector<K> keys)¶

Queries keys in a batch.

Return

Values of the keys queried.

Parameters

  • keys: Keys to be queried.
